Interface IScanner

All Known Implementing Classes:
JavaCoreScanner
public interface IScanner
Lowest level of the javacore parser. Returns a new token until all characters in the input stream are consumed

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    allTokensGenerated()

    next()
    Each call to next returns a new token,

  • Method Details

    • next

      IParserToken next() throws IOException, ScannerException
      Each call to next returns a new token,
      Returns:
      next token to be scanned, or null all tokens generated
      Throws:
      IOException
      ScannerException
